### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to get an entity that does not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access (e.g., boiler) is present at the specified position before attempting to get it.

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Check the positions of the entities you are trying to connect and ensure there are no obstacles in the way. Make sure the connection points are valid and that the pipes can connect without any issues.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities in the target position that may block placement.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all power connections are established correctly and that entities requiring power are connected to a power source.
